tasks.title: Add System Metrics Endpoint
tasks.description: Create a new backend endpoint /api/system/metrics that returns real-time system metrics including memory usage, CPU usage, active connections, and database performance. Save the endpoint implementation in the project_selfdevelop directory.

tasks.title: Create Real-time Metrics Dashboard
tasks.description: Build a React component that displays live system metrics with charts and color-coded indicators. Use WebSocket for real-time updates and save the component in the project_selfdevelop directory.

tasks.title: Comprehensive System Testing
tasks.description: Write complete test suites for the metrics endpoint and dashboard component. Include unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests. Save all tests in the project_selfdevelop directory.
